title: COAST ORB / reflectingwaterthought
description: CONVO: Dead industry polluted the waters. Though the boom is long forgotten, the damage continues.

dialogueTree.title: Rhetoric: "Wait -- take a longer look at yours..."
dialogueTree.text: Wait -- take a longer look at yourself and how you're reflected in that slick chemical rainbow. What do you *see*?

links.title: You: "Some kind of metaphor for me?"
links.text: Some kind of metaphor for me?

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is more important than you. Th..."
links.text: This is more important than you. That's the blood of industry you see before you. The run off from Coal City, further down the coast.

links.title: Rhetoric: "The engines of fortune once roared..."
links.text: The engines of fortune once roared here. Great wealth poured into Revachol, the Delta. As did smoke, waste, sickness, life...

links.title: Rhetoric: "The engines stopped. The West Revac..."
links.text: The engines stopped. The West Revacholian industrial base was dismantled after the war. Now, extinguished coke furnaces dot the landscape. A landscape despoiled by industry.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Filth! This needs environmental act..."
links.text: Filth! This needs environmental action -- now!

links.title: You: "I don't see the problem. Revachol m..."
links.text: I don't see the problem. Revachol moved on to a service industry. Get with the times, yo.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Right. Here's some advice that's go..."
links.text: Right. Here's some advice that's good for business and life: never fight a losing battle. I'm not even going to argue with you.

links.title: You: "West Revacholian industrial base? T..."
links.text: West Revacholian industrial base? That's so me.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes. Fortune left you too, leaving..."
links.text: Yes. Fortune left you too, leaving only pharmaceuticals and a sub-par service based industry.

links.title: You: "There was a serious dereliction of..."
links.text: There was a serious dereliction of duty in this clean up.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Perhaps you could dedicate your lif..."
links.text: Perhaps you could dedicate your life to cleaning it up. But you're a cop. You must concern yourself with different messes. Even so: it's pretty to think.

links.title: Rhetoric: "No! For a second, think about somet..."
links.text: No! For a second, think about something other than yourself -- think about *the blood of industry* here before you. The run off from Coal City, further down the coast.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Exactly! The *blood of industry*. T..."
links.text: Exactly! The *blood of industry*. The run off from Coal City, further down the coast.
